Text: CAISO Liaison Cc Mary I have left voice mails with both Debi LeVine Director of Contracts and Roger Smith Senior Regulatory Counsel of the CAISO Rogers no is I reached Debi through the operator at If I hear back I will briefly describe our mission re the RTO West tariff integration group try to get a contact that we can work with and then either refer them to you or try a way call if they are interested in following up right then Paul Paul B Mohler Attorney HellerEhrman Connecticut Ave NW Suite Washington DC Direct Fax Email The information contained in this email message may be privileged confidential and protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient any dissemination distribution or copying is strictly prohibited If you think that you have received this email message in error please email the sender at

Revised ADR Provision Options Cc what Mary and Don sent and should subject to any revisions by Sarah be close to the final product for posting and discussion next week Please let Sarah or me know if I missed anything or if you find any errors that should be corrected before posting Thanks to everyone for helping put this together Regards Paul ADR Provision Options vrtf Paul B Mohler Attorney HellerEhrman Connecticut Ave NW Suite Washington DC Direct Fax Email The information contained in this email message may be privileged confidential and protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient any dissemination distribution or copying is strictly prohibited If you think that you have received this email message in error please email the sender at ADR Provision Options vrtf

ADR Options Cc Options Masterrtf Hi Sarah Here is the compilation of ADRrelated options I havent yet received anything from Mary or Don so these sections are not included in this version I started to incorporate the various pieces of this into the ADR provision itself but it quickly became clear that was not going to be a productive task until we narrow the options I will not be in Portland next week but will dial in if that option is available Thanks Paul Paul B Mohler Attorney HellerEhrman Connecticut Ave NW Suite Washington DC Direct Fax Email The information contained in this email message may be privileged confidential and protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient any dissemination distribution or copying is strictly prohibited If you think that you have received this email message in error please email the sender at ADR Options Masterrtf

ADR Provision for RTO West Tariff Cc at last weeks tariff integration group meeting I will be collecting and organizing the revisionsoptions we discussed for the RTO West Tariff ADR provision I owe the compiled results to Sarah by Friday March so would appreciate getting whatever you can provide to me by Thursday March at the latest The assignments as I recorded them are Carl Fasttrack option Don Parties can agree to take all or part of dispute to FERC Gary Default baseball or not Mary Applicability to unaccepted service agreements Paul Preliminary required mediation Paul w Shelly Sources for mediatorsarbitrators Attached for your convenience are the fasttrack intereconnection and regular ADR provisions from the TOA Dispute Resolutiondoc Thanks Paul Paul B Mohler Attorney HellerEhrman Connecticut Ave NW Suite Washington DC Direct Fax Email The information contained in this email message may be privileged confidential and protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient any dissemination distribution or copying is strictly prohibited If you think that you have received this email message in error please email the sender at Dispute Resolutiondoc

CAISO Liaison Cc Mary I have left voice mails with both Debi LeVine Director of Contracts and Roger Smith Senior Regulatory Counsel of the CAISO Rogers no is I reached Debi through the operator at If I hear back I will briefly describe our mission re the RTO West tariff integration group try to get a contact that we can work with and then either refer them to you or try a way call if they are interested in following up right then Paul Paul B Mohler Attorney HellerEhrman Connecticut Ave NW Suite Washington DC Direct Fax Email The information contained in this email message may be privileged confidential and protected from disclosure If you are not the intended recipient any dissemination distribution or copying is strictly prohibited If you think that you have received this email message in error please email the sender at
